page.title: 16A Day in the Life of a P.C.
page.content: Permanent beat officer P.C.Kirton works split shifts from 08.00 until 13.00 and 20.00 until 23.00.He lives out of town,driving to work in order to arrive at 07.45.His first task is to call Sunderland's main police station to find out what has happened whilst he was off duty.He then follows up the information.He checks second hand shops for stolen property,looks around for stolen cars and visits houses that have been burgled.He is in constant radio contact with H.Q.He has a personal call sign. He works 7 days and then has 2 days off.Every fourth week he has 4 days off.In his leisure time he enjoys a game of golf or badminton and sometimes goes swimming.He enjoys his job because he meets lots of people and hasa lot of variety in his work.
